reviews.review:
Before talking about the movie we need to understand that we are not talking about a normal movie.
This is not just another movie, this is a Marvel movie!, so it's important  to think about the other movies (Thor Ragnarok, Avengers:Age Of Ultron, etc), the cinema industry has changed and today we can talk about the industry  as something different, comics used to be something just for entertaining, and today it's something different.
We have to think that this is a movie inspired by the comics, and don't forget how crazy comic stories used to be. 
Talking about the movie and the background from where it comes (comics), I like the Russo Brothers view about the MCU, the movie is a perfect balance between everything, they mix the humor with the issues perfectly, the magic and the cience, etc. 
About the characters they all have their own moment, obviously the one that stole the show was Thanos and it was the perfect decision, we don't know who is (in the MCU) and we needed the best villain for this movie, he has a motivation and at the same time he is intimidating
I really fell that everything could go down during the whole movie, no one is safe 

Just amazing
It's a spectacle, but lacks substance.
One if the best movie going experiences ever. Marvel knocks it out of the park with this one. Seeing all the characters together. Thanos was awesome. Definitely worth the hype.
Great movie, action from beginning to end
I enjoyed this Avengers Movie, good from start to finish and the ending, the ending was so good because it set's up an interesting plot for Part 2

I think this movie is getting a lot of undeserved criticism. Where it may not have been marvels best piece it was still a very captivating ride & up there with one of the best I have seen. it makes you feel every emotion & people are just complaining because it didn't go the way they had pictured in their heads. thanos is probably the best villian the mcu has seen, he makes you root for him but also hate him at the same death. yes there was many character deaths but ultimately that was always going to happen given the tone of the movie. people wanted to see this movie & are now complaining that it was too long, you just can't win apparently.
characters will be back in the next movie we know that but those complaining that it's too depressing obviously were not listening when thanos said half of humanity would die. you honestly think this was gonna be all sunshine & rainbows. honestly I thoroughly enjoyed this movie, it made me mad, made me cry basically I felt every emotion which I what this movie was intending to do.
It was AMAZING!!! The plot, the climax, the deaths are on point. One of the best Marvel movies ever!
Critics dont know what they are talking about ...  this movie was the best mcu movie to date! Completely shook and speechless thank you Disney! Lol

This movie was everything I could have wanted from a comic movie and from a series I've been following since high school. If you like action, adventure, lasting consequences and heroic last stands then you would love this movie. Support this movie more than the trite that Lucas Film is trying to pass off as a series.
Great movie if you have seen all the other marvel movies. It gets less better if you havenâ€™t seen the other MCU movies.
